name: cbv3hv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, w0))

|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, w0))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))

comment: Version of ~ cbv3h with a disjoint variable condition on ` x , y ` , which does not require ~ ax-13 . Was used in a proof of ~ axc11n (but of independent interest). (Contributed by NM, 25-Jul-2015.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 29-Nov-2020.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 30-Nov-2020.)
